# Remarq

> Lightweight, self-hosted document annotation tool for the agent era. Drop a script tag into any HTML page â€” reviewers highlight text and leave threaded comments, then AI agents poll the API, revise documents, and resolve comments automatically.

Remarq turns human feedback into structured API data that AI agents can consume and act on. No accounts required. One script tag integration. Works on any HTML page.

## Docs

- [README](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq/blob/main/README.md): Overview, quick start, feature list, and comparison with Google Docs
- [API Reference](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq/blob/main/docs/api.md): Full REST API documentation with request/response schemas, error codes, and curl examples
- [Best Practices](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq/blob/main/docs/best-practices.md): Deployment configs, content selector strategies, agent integration patterns, multi-reviewer workflows
- [Full LLM Documentation](https://remarq.ing/llms-full.txt): Complete technical reference with all API details inline

## Installation

- [Quick Start](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq#quick-start): Clone repo, docker compose up, add script tag
- [npm Package](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@csalvato/remarq-server): `npx @csalvato/remarq-server`
- [Docker Compose](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq/blob/main/docker-compose.remarq.yml): Production deployment with bundled Postgres

## API Endpoints

- [GET /health](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq/blob/main/docs/api.md#health-check): Server health check
- [GET /documents](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq/blob/main/docs/api.md#documents): List all documents
- [POST /documents](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq/blob/main/docs/api.md#post-documents): Create or find a document by URI
- [GET /comments](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq/blob/main/docs/api.md#comments): List and filter comments (by document, URI, status)
- [POST /comments](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq/blob/main/docs/api.md#post-comments): Create a comment or reply
- [PATCH /comments/:id](https://github.com/cass-clearly/remarq/blob/main/docs/api.md#patch-commentsid): Update body or status (open/closed)
